document.full_text: despite the distaste it generates among hockey executives, the regular-season shootout is here to stay. purists, at least, are comforted by the lack of support for installing shootouts in the playoffs.
document.title: n.h.l. math often equals points for all
lines_and_colors: despite the distaste it generates among hockey executives, the regular-season shootout is here to stay. purists, at least, are comforted by the lack of support for installing shootouts in the playoffs.
